dcterms:description: The Bertha-Benz Memorial Route is a historic route that was autonomously driven by a Mercedes-Benz S-Class, covering rural roads, small villages, and major cities, requiring the vehicle to react to various traffic scenarios.
dcterms:title: Bertha-Benz Memorial Route

dcterms:description: TORCS is an open racing car simulator that provides a platform for testing and developing autonomous driving algorithms in a simulated racing environment.
dcterms:title: TORCS (The Open Racing Car Simulator)

dcterms:creator: U. Muller
J. Ben
E. Cosatto
B. Flepp
Y.L. Cun
dcterms:description: DAVE is a dataset used for training autonomous vehicles, consisting of data collected from a human driver to predict steering angles in various driving conditions.
dcterms:title: DAVE (DARPA Autonomous Vehicle)

dcterms:creator: M. Bansal
A. Krizhevsky
A. Ogale
dcterms:description: ChauffeurNet is a dataset designed for training autonomous vehicles by imitating expert driving behavior and synthesizing challenging scenarios.
dcterms:title: ChauffeurNet

dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy
G. Ros
F. Codevilla
A. Lopez
V. Koltun
dcterms:description: The CARLA Simulator is an open-source simulator for autonomous driving research, providing a realistic environment for testing and developing driving algorithms.
dcterms:title: CARLA Simulator
